title: As Josua Grübler Found his Way: At the Deathbed (Wie Josua Grübler seinen Weg fand: Am Sterbebett) (in-text plate, page 232) from Neben der Heerstrasse (Off the Main Road)
medium: Woodcut from an illustrated book with twenty-four woodcuts
